title: Executive / Administrative Assistant  with Quick Books Experience (Remote)
job_overview:
OM IT Engineering is looking for a highly organized and experienced executive/Admin assistant with Quickbooks experince. You must have Quickbooks online experience with the following tasks :-
Proficiency in QuickBooks Online (QBO) with hands-on experience managing invoicing, estimates, expense coding, and vendor payments within Quickbooks. Don't apply if you don't have this experience. 

Key Responsibilities
3-5 years of experience in executive or administrative support roles
Proficiency in QuickBooks Online (QBO) with hands-on experience managing invoicing, estimates, expense coding, and vendor payments
Experience supporting financial operations in a small business or professional services environment
Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
High level of discretion and professionalism in handling confidential information
Proficient in Google Workspace or Microsoft Office Suite, with strong spreadsheet skills
Comfortable learning and using cloud-based tools like Monday, Trello, or Slack
Self-starter mindset with a focus on proactive support and reliable follow-through

Accounting & Project Management
- Enter clients and projects into QuickBooks Online and Monograph
-  Set up and maintain project estimates, phases, staffing allocations, and budgets
-  Manage invoicing (15th and 30th), statements (30th), and billing follow-ups
-  Process and code expenses: courier, FedEx, printing, consultant payments
-  Track reimbursable costs and ensure accurate project-level accounting
